import { React, useState } from "react"; import { Card, Button, Modal } from "react-bootstrap"; export default function SingleNote(props) { const [show, setShow] = useState(false); const handleClose = () => setShow(false); const handleShow = () => setShow(true); return (
{props.note.categories} {props.note.title} Modal heading Woohoo, you're reading this text in a modal!
); }
